class.name: TextHitInfo
class.brief_description: Represents a cluster position in a [TextLayout]. Used to specify caret and insertion positions within [TextLayout].

method.name: get_bounds
method.description: Returns the bounds of cluster hit.

method.name: get_index_end
method.description: Returns last character's index of the cluster hit.

method.name: get_index_insertion
method.description: Returns insertion index (cluster's first character index if the leading half of the character was hit, and one greater than the cluster's last character index if the trailing half was hit).

method.name: get_index_start
method.description: Returns first character's index of the cluster hit.

method.name: get_leading_edge
method.description: Returns leading edge of cluster hit.

method.name: get_trailing_edge
method.description: Returns trailing edge of cluster hit.

method.name: get_type
method.description: Returns type of cluster hit (any of the [code]OBJECT_*[/code] values).
